citeinfo.title: Dakota County Address Points Dataset
citeinfo.origin: Contains data originating from cities and townships in Dakota County.

descript.abstract:
This dataset is a compilation of address point data from Dakota County address authorities, which are cities and townships. The dataset is intended to contain a point location and the official address (as defined by the address authority) for all occupiable units and any other official addresses within the jurisdictional boundary of each address authority. A number of other attributes are available in the dataset, but may not be populated by some address authorities.
Dakota County is playing a coordinative role to work with cities and townships to create, maintain and aggregate address points.
descript.purpose: To view, query and analyze address point data in Dakota County, and to have a single, authoritative source of the official address for any location

timeperd.current: Currently this dataset is updated on a weekly basis. It is up to each address authority to send updates to the data distributor, Dakota County. This dataset contains all updates received by Dakota County as of the Time Period of Content date shown above.

idinfo.native: Native environment varies by address authority.

procstep.procdesc: Dakota County works with the city and township address authorities to create and maintain the address points data. For information about lineage at the data development level, contact each address authority.

dataqual.complete: It has been observed for multi-address parcels that in some instances all address points are provided and in other instances only a single point is provided, even when multiple official addresses exist within that parcel. In other cases, some but not all address points are provided for such parcels. Data users should use some discretion in making assumptions about the completeness of the dataset. It is expected that this dataset will become more complete over time.

spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One layer for entire area covered

overview.eaover:
A list of the attribute names and field types is shown below. Detailed information about the attributes can be found at: http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Address_Points_Database_Specifications.pdf
Field Name Description ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ADD_ID_NAT: National Address Unique ID (Text 60)
ADD_ID_LOC: Local Address Unique ID (Text 50)
ANUMBERPRE: Address Number Prefix (Text 6)
ANUMBER: Address Number (Integer10)
ANUMBERSUF: Address Number Suffix (Text 6)
ANUMBERSEP: Address Number Separator Element (Text 1)
ST_PRE_MOD: Street Name Pre Modifier (Text 10)
ST_PRE_DIR: Street Name Pre Directional (Text 9)
ST_PRE_TYP: Street Name Pre Type (Text 24)
ST_NAME: Street Name (Text 42)
ST_POS_TYP: Street Name Post Type (Text 12)
ST_POS_DIR: Street Name Post Directiona (Text 9)
ST_POS_MOD: Street Name Post Modifier (Text 12)
SUB_TYPE1: Subaddress Type 1 (Text 12)
SUB_ID1: Subaddress Identifier 1 (Text 12)
SUB_TYPE2: Subaddress Type 2 (Text 12)
SUB_ID2: Subaddress Identifier 2 (Text 12)
MUNI_NAME: Municipal Jurisdiction Name (Text 30)
MUNI_CODE: Munipal Jurisdiction Code (Text 8)
USPS_PLACE: USPS Place Name (Text 30)
CO_CODE: County Code (Text 3)
CO_NAME: County Name (Text 20)
STATE_CODE: State Code (Text 2)
ZIP: Zip Code (Text 5)
ZIP4: Zip Plus 4 (Text 4)
LOC_DESC: Location Description (Text 40)
LANDMARK: Landmark Name (Text 40)
RESIDENCE: Residence (Text 10)
MAILABLE : Mailable Address (Text 10)
STATUS: Lifecycle Status (Text 10)
PIN: Parcel Unique Identifier (Text 17)
LONGITUDE: Longitude (Double)
LATITUDE: Latitude (Double)
POSI_ACCU: Positional Accuracy Indicator (Integer2)
ADIRSOURCE: Address Direct Source (Text 40)
AAUTHORITY: Address Authority (Text 40)
EDIT_ORG: Editing Organization (Text 40)
UPDATEDATE: Update Date (Date)

stdorder.ordering:
Distributed by Dakota County via the Minnesota Geospatial Commons.
Also available directly from Dakota County GIS site: https://www.co.dakota.mn.us/HomeProperty/MappingServices/GISData/Pages/default.aspx

distinfo.distliab: Dakota County GIS Database Disclaimer NOTICE: Dakota County Geographic Information System (GIS) Data are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13) THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by Dakota County ('County') for their own internal business purposes. The County does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, you must provide a copy of this disclaimer and the accompanying metadata for this dataset to the user.
